alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Walker, western Tuscaloosa and southeastern Fayette Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oakman to 8 miles south of Bankston. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Tuscaloosa, Northport, Berry, Parrish, Coker, Oakman, Samantha, Lake Lurleen State Park, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Boley Springs, Binion Creek Landing, Moores Bridge, Flatwoods, West Corona, Stillman College, Echola, Corona, Townley and Oliver Lock And Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
